Description: Lower part of a limestone stela of Intef; fifteen rows of Hieroglyphic text including the cartouches of Senusret I; representation of deceased in lower left-hand corner.
Curator's comments: Stela from Abydos cenotpah. ANOC 5.3; ANOC 5 includes 572, 581, 461 (statue) Freed, R E, 1996, in Fs. Simpson, p. 323 Translation: Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Autobiographies (OBO 84): p.108-109
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.24)
